alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:29PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chickasaw, southeastern Itawamba and Monroe Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 428 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prairie, or 10 miles southwest of Aberdeen, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Fulton, Smithville, Tremont, Prairie, New Salem, New Wren, Trebloc, Evergreen, Clay, Nettleton, Hatley, Abney, Eastman, Quincy, Turon, Egypt, Wise Gap and Wren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
